title: What TIME does Season 7 end?
body: Does anyone if if it ends as soon as it hits midnight tonight and the calender ticks over? or is it Midnight tomorrow? or something else?

replies.body: Can someone possibly clarify? "The 2017 season ends November 7 4:00 AM AEDT in Oceania" = 12PM / Noon on November 7th, just about 24 hours from now...Other websites say 23:59 on November 7th....
Its actually so dumb that NA gets a full day and a half extra...
not really... since OCE's season starts earlier too.
Well it shouldn't be a day and a half, 16 hours is the time difference.
"The 2017 season ends November 7 4:00 AM AEDT in Oceania."

4ammmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm

you're kidding lol, all hopes and dreams gone I'm pretty sure
Never give up on your dreams friend
